Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.query.distance

Prepared queries for distances.

See:
          Description


Interface Summary
DistanceQuery<O,D extends Distance<?>> A distance query serves as adapter layer for database and primitive distances.
SpatialDistanceQuery<V extends SpatialComparable,D extends Distance<D>> Query interface for spatial distance queries.
 

Class Summary
AbstractDatabaseDistanceQuery<O,D extends Distance<D>> Run a database query in a database context.
AbstractDistanceQuery<O,D extends Distance<D>> A distance query serves as adapter layer for database and primitive distances.
DBIDDistanceQuery<D extends Distance<D>> Run a distance query based on DBIDs
PrimitiveDistanceQuery<O,D extends Distance<D>> Run a database query in a database context.
PrimitiveDistanceSimilarityQuery<O,D extends Distance<D>> Combination query class, for convenience.
SpatialPrimitiveDistanceQuery<V extends SpatialComparable,D extends Distance<D>> Distance query for spatial distance functions
